thing-type.label: ZW6302 Portable Smart Motion Sensor
thing-type.description: Portable Smart Motion Sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtMake the move toward convenience with the Z-Wave Portable Smart Motion Sensor for your home. This Z-Wave compatible device boosts the safety of your home by working with your home’s gateway to wirelessly trigger scenes and send alerts to your smartphone or tablet whenever motion is detected. <br /&gtUse the included batteries for easy placement anywhere, plug into the wall using a AC adapter and USB cable – never replace batteries again. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtOnce the controller is ready to include your motion sensor, press and release the button on the sensor to include it in the network</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtOnce the controller is ready to exclude your motion sensor, press and release the button on the sensor to exclude it from the network. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress and release the button on the sensor</p&gt
